AngII may engage two different receptors, AT1R and AT2R, which play opposite roles. AT1R facilitates the endocytosis of membrane-bound ACE2 at the cell surface and delivers it to the lysosomes for degradation. Upon delivery, AT1R returns to the plasma membrane to repeat this task.
10 AT2R, in contrast, induces the activation of functional ACE2, which converts AngII to Ang(1-7).
